website_summaries.verdict: Lifx has slowly been getting better, and the recent addition of an IFTTT channel is its biggest step forward yet. If you're tempted by color-changing smart LEDs, it merits consideration.
pros: Putting out bright, vivid, accurate colors and a full spectrum of natural tones at up to 1,000 lumens, the Lifx bulb boasts impressive lighting qualities
The new IFTTT channel adds some sorely needed smart functionality, too
cons: The bulb's app still isn't useful for very much more than basic color selection
Also, despite some progress, Lifx still lags behind Philips Hue in terms of third-party integration and overall user experience

customer_reviews.title: Bright light, colorful light, first light I buy tonight.
customer_reviews.text: Dear god I love this bulb. You probably won't have a "need" for 16 million colors, but it can be really nice to hit whatever shade you want. The effects are really awesome too, especially if you have multiple bulbs. Plus, add it in to home automation recipes through things like IFTTT and it's great. I don't know how I would feel about it at regular retail price, but if you catch it when it's on sale, you should buy one. I'll tell you, though, it's like like a Pringles - betcha can't just eat (buy) one. It just puts the concepts of normal lighting to shame and it's very bright (if you want it to be)
customer_reviews.author: Scott Gerhardt

customer_reviews.title: Bright and colorful!
customer_reviews.text: I love these. The are super bright, and have vibrant colors, but also can dim appropriately to whatever you want. I think I read a review where someone complained that the lights default to full bright if the actual switch gets shut off and then turned back on. But that really makes the most sense, in case you don't have your phone easily available when you walk in the door and you want to see where you're going. Otherwise, you may flip the switch and be bathed in a bluish pink tint, from your last nights party. (There's lots of apps for all platforms that support LiFX and Hue at the same time, for you Hue lovers)
customer_reviews.author: Jason R

customer_reviews.title: The color control feature is nice, I really like how I can bring different ...
customer_reviews.text: Fascinating bulb. First, the software works ok, Only problem I have not been able to sync with the the nest fire alarm yet. This was the feature I bought it for, so my hall way would light in case of a fire. The color control feature is nice, I really like how I can bring different moods to the home. It is still too expensive if your going outfit your home in my opinion, however it does work with some minor software glitches i am sure LIFX will solve.
customer_reviews.author: RoyM2

customer_reviews.title: It's a good lightbulb
customer_reviews.text: Here we go... This is a pretty cool ass lightbulb, wish it was cheaper so i could have more of them in the house Pros Does everything that is advertised and comes with a number of cool effects have a wide range of color temperatures and white balances works in any light socket and is responsive Cons Not really any, other than if two people have app for the light open it will often crash the app and momentarily freeze the lightbuld ps. do not purchase any app for this, the free app that comes with it is by far the most responsive and comes with the most options
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this light
customer_reviews.text: I love this light. Yes, it is big and heavy and some fixtures may not be best suited, though most households will be able to find a suitable fixture. I had originally purchased the A19 White on sale at Best Buy for under $30. I enjoyed the whites, and dimmable capabilities of that first bulb I knew that I would not be satisfied until I bought one of the color bulbs as well. The light represents saturated colors very well and combined with dimmable capabilities it recreates the household environment. I waiting for the next discount on the A19 multi-color bulb.
customer_reviews.author: Randy R Potter

customer_reviews.title: Lousy product, 33% failure rate from my perspective.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 3 and one stopped working about the time the warranty expired. Just would not pair with my phone. Thought I would just continue to us it as a regular light bulb, but about a week later it just decided to turn red. Cust ser is non existent so what I had planned to use throughout my home will never be purchased again. Sad because with a just a little bit of concern for prod quality and cust satisfaction they would have had a viral product.
customer_reviews.author: WTR

customer_reviews.title: Cool and fun light
customer_reviews.text: Nearly a year old now and son uses it as main light in his room. Nice as turning wall switch on and it lights up, the app is not required to get the light on. He can turn it off with the app and I just flip the wall switch and it comes back on. The colors and effects are awesome and plays with it regularly. Probably order one for front porch and use it for different seasons like Halloween, Christmas, and more.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Turner

customer_reviews.title: They work great as color changing lights
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased 5 of these in total now, I have had them for 3 months without a single problem. They work great as color changing lights. The colors are really bright. Sometimes the app would be a little slow to respond, but the firmware update today fixed any sluggishness that the app had and now they are super responsive. They also now have ifttt support. I'll be honest that I don't really see the point in using ifttt but maybe I'll think of something at some point. All in all I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: PaisleyArtMachine

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with the light bulb
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the light bulb, however I am very disappointed with their support. They are not very good about getting back to you with useful information. It is very difficult to set up their cloud so you may program a schedule for the light bulb. I have not been able to do this and I am very experienced with PC's and IOS. It should not be this hard. Programming is a great feature, I would like to be able to set a schedule for my light. UPDATE - The app is now working correctly. Still should not be so hard.
customer_reviews.author: mark vidovich

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bulb, when connected to the app you can ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing bulb, when connected to the app you can do so much with it, I have it flash my teams colors when they score, we liked it so much we bought a 2nd one,
customer_reviews.author: Scuba Steve

customer_reviews.title: I thought these would be kinda fun. HOLY COW
customer_reviews.text: I thought these would be kinda fun. HOLY COW, I cannot believe how much I enjoy them! I have two in the lights above the island in my kitchen. I can make a nice, bright workspace, or I can soften the mood, or create something fun and vibrant. I will be buying more for other areas of my home. These are really quite amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Fuzzy Urchin

customer_reviews.title: I love this bulb and anyone I've shown it to has ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this bulb and anyone I've shown it to has thought it was the best thing ever. On the new updates, there are no bugs. So worth it. The colors are vivid and there are different modes, like it can respond to music you play, and you can sync it with the app "IFF" and set up this like a wake up alarm, or the colors to flash a certain color if you get a facebook message. Very cool. Would buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Ruby H

customer_reviews.title: Don't know
customer_reviews.text: This LIFX A21 never got to me, but I know the A19 is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: The most amazing Lights ever
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have bought 10 of these they are simply amazing and work so well and were very easy to setup. They create the most amazing light modes for your room to se the just the right mood. They are very well built and so far mine have lasted without any issues for almost a year.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Brantley

customer_reviews.title: Best Color Smart Bulb!!
customer_reviews.text: Lifx by far has the best color compared to other smart bulbs. They are very well built, and they work great. The Lifx app is wonderful and easy to use plus there are a bunch of Smart Home integration platforms you can use them on.
customer_reviews.author: Schpeen

customer_reviews.title: Loved the product initially but after a couple of months ...
customer_reviews.text: Product and service failed. Loved the product initially but after a couple of months the bulb seems to have burned out. I get a clicking noise from it and every attempt to restart per the instructions listed on their site failed. I contacted their support and got no response. It's a great idea but if the product and company are unreliable, you're better off investing in something like Phillips (I wish that wasn't the case). As it stands I paid $50 for a lightbulb that's dead after two months. I'm really hesitant to buy from a company that won't stand by their product.
customer_reviews.author: Kento Sugiura

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed specially after moving from a cheap BT bulb
customer_reviews.text: So it failed after a month. First began to lose connection all the time. Now it turns on with the "red-orange" warning. Extremely disappointed specially after moving from a cheap BT bulb. Worst of all, support hasn't even gotten back to me.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Umanzor

customer_reviews.title: We're disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Our light burnt out in 5 months. We expected a long life from it. At least two years considering it wasn't used all day or night, only occasionally. We're disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Trekie

customer_reviews.title: ... phillip hue lights but the colors didn't look that great besides the red and blue
customer_reviews.text: I originally had a phillip hue lights but the colors didn't look that great besides the red and blue. Not to mention having to plug it into the modem was kind of a negative as well. Then i discovered LIFX these lights are amazing the variety of colors its amazing if I could give it more stars i would.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: These things are super nice but expensive
customer_reviews.text: These things are super nice but expensive. I think these work better than the Philips Hue bulbs but they don't have as much support when it comes to other apps or hardware like the Amazon Echo.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly K.

customer_reviews.title: but are getting consistently better. Not sure I like the "all cloud all ...
customer_reviews.text: As a Kickstarter backer I've been a fan of Lifx from the very beginning. They've had some rough patches, but are getting consistently better. Not sure I like the "all cloud all the time" direction they're going, but they certainly function well enough!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua P

customer_reviews.title: Not Bright enough unless you're just getting it for colored ...
customer_reviews.text: Not Bright enough unless you're just getting it for colored mood lighting, no control for automatic timer that I could find. When they get as bright as a 100 watt bulb, then it's worth considering.
customer_reviews.author: Eric P

customer_reviews.title: The bulb is huge. But that doesnt' matter.
customer_reviews.text: It works as advertised in every way. If the monochromic and cheaper ones come out, I will buy more of their bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Yuxiao Dai

customer_reviews.title: A bit pricey, but bright and entertaining.
customer_reviews.text: These things are an absolute blast. Would be 5 stars, but the Android app seems to keep losing connectivity.
customer_reviews.author: Darrel

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: too much of a hassle to get it to work correctly!!
customer_reviews.author: rootsman

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Good bulb. App lags a bit when recognizing the bulb from time to time. Themes aren't really useful if you only have one bulb, though I can't say that multiple bulbs is better as I only have one. Overall good quality, good price. Energy hog.
customer_reviews.author: bonss

customer_reviews.title: HAVE TO SET IT UP OVER AND OVER AND OVER - HOURS OF TIME TRYING TO GET IT TO WORK!
customer_reviews.text: Get ready to spend hours setting up this bulb over and over and over and over ! It works and it's cool and then you have to start all over again every single day!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love my LIFX
customer_reviews.text: bought 2 of them when they dropped the price to $40. Best purchase i've made in a while
customer_reviews.author: Alberto Lora

customer_reviews.title: wifi is good!
customer_reviews.text: Looking back, I wish I had bought these versus the Philips Hue with the hub. Works perfectly, wifi is good!
customer_reviews.author: JB & JS

customer_reviews.title: He's a big techy guy and he absolutely loved this gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my pops on Christmas. He's a big techy guy and he absolutely loved this gift.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Kerr

customer_reviews.title: Initially disconnected frequently (like 1x per week) but lately has ...
customer_reviews.text: Initially disconnected frequently (like 1x per week) but lately has been going strong for over 2 months without issue.
customer_reviews.author: Thmstec

customer_reviews.title: Could be brighter.
customer_reviews.text: It could be brighter but what the brightest one I could find.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I was able to set it on a schedule, which was really cool.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Orzolek

customer_reviews.title: Configuration was easy, without a hitch
customer_reviews.text: Configuration was easy, without a hitch. However, I occasionally have to wait up to about 30 seconds for the App to find the Lifx before I can change color/brightness. This is quite an inconvenience, especially when I need to turn on/off the lamp. My set of hue is behaving well in this respect. On the positive side, the green is deep, lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Taylan A.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: love the idea but have prob with keeping them linked to my phone
customer_reviews.author: Holmden Family

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Works just as advertised! Adds really nice ambiance to my living room with just one bulb. After a little bit of work, I can control the light from my Android smartphone, PC, and even my Pebble!
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Great great great light!
customer_reviews.text: The Original light is the absolute best model. Runs very hot - but this is the best model ever!
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Good idea, needs more functionality
customer_reviews.text: LIFX connects to my Nest Thermostat which is one of the reasons why I purchased this list. I really wish that I could control the light when I am away from my home network. Unfortunately, not at this time. I can control the light with my phone only when the phone and light are on the same network.
customer_reviews.author: JM in Miami

customer_reviews.title: Colorful lighting
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly, well cushioned for shipment. So far it's working great.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Dunn

customer_reviews.title: This is great and fun
customer_reviews.text: This is great and fun. Like the fact that I can control the light bulbs from my phone very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: james aguirre/ Elisabet Ramos

customer_reviews.title: WEP router
customer_reviews.text: Haven't been able to use properly yet because bulbs won't connect to my router... Light is so bright though and reaches full brightness almost instantly :D
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great colors and the app is really easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Read if you're on the fence.
customer_reviews.text: Hello anonymous reader. You are probably wondering whether or not you should take the plunge. You've done your research, read the bad reviews, but the concept is just so damn cool that you're on the fence. I think you have to ask yourself two questions. 1. Am I the type of person who expects products to work as they say they will? 2. Am I the type of person who will forgive question 1, lowering my expectations when dealing with multiple connection dropouts, troubleshooting, wireless reboots, emails with support, etc., and won't lose my s*** the 101th time the app shows a damn video loader screen rather than a color wheel?
customer_reviews.author: REVIEW JUSTICE

customer_reviews.title: Good as long as you dont EVER update the firmware ....
customer_reviews.text: whatever you do, dont try updating the firmware ... chances are that if you do and either the phone app or PC/Mac updater finds, and attempts to update, more than one bulb the updates will fail and the bulbs will more than likely be bricked and unusable, even after doing a hard reset.
customer_reviews.author: Laurence Cable

customer_reviews.title: LifX
customer_reviews.text: Excellent really neat bulbs They make quite a great light of many colors and reall enhance a room they operate at a very cool temperature and the wireless wi-fi control is outstanding. I will buy more for sure!
customer_reviews.author: SPINNERBUG

customer_reviews.title: I guess I just don't get it
customer_reviews.text: i like the idea of home automation, IoT, etc but I just do not get $100 light bulb that I can make red, blue or green? In my day I did like black lights and black light posters but have found that this bulb is not for me.
customer_reviews.author: dfwsig

customer_reviews.title: I gave this as a gift to a friend. ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift to a friend. He totally loves it. He also said that I should buy one for me.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Rodriguez Gomez

customer_reviews.title: very cool product but it's connectivity to wifi is sketchy...at times ...
customer_reviews.text: very cool product but it's connectivity to wifi is sketchy...at times it connects and at times it doesn't..kind of frustrating for a $100 light bulb.
customer_reviews.author: Videoman

customer_reviews.title: Bright bold colors, easy setup, and worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This product continues to amaze me. The company is consistently rolling out updates and the bulbs operate fantastically. I have had 2 of these bulbs on my porch for halloween and the spooky colors you can get from these bulbs is fantastic. I had a Deep red and a dark purple that looked amazing even when it was daylight. Now I have one green and the other red for Christmas! I live in Louisiana and the muggy, rainy, humid heat has had no effect on them outside. They are always connected and come on and off when I schedule them to do so. Setup is very easy and streamlined. Anyone with a smartphone can do this.
customer_reviews.author: Sparkyc4

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these bulbs! I have tried many different ones, hands down, lifx is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Thedoc

customer_reviews.title: Great bulb, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This bulb is great. I'm supprised I havent seen this for sale in stores. It is very bright, the app is good, and it has IFTTT support (although the delay between IFTTT triggers and the bulb actually doing stuff is long. Im sure that's more to do with IFTTT than the actual bulb). It also doesnt need a hub like with more expensive bulbs like the Philips Hue. I'm going to replace all my bulbs with this. BTW, you don't need the app to control the bulb. If you turn the light switch off and on again, it will just turn on with the last settings you had it on. Then it will just work like a normal light bulb.
customer_reviews.author: Odis Clemons

customer_reviews.title: IoT WiFi connected
customer_reviews.text: Well made a has good security for IoT. Works with Nest!
customer_reviews.author: S. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Please bring back the scenes.
customer_reviews.text: We enjoyed this light bulb until they updated the app, and took the ability to save scenes (or customized settings) away. Now it's just an over priced colored bulb. Please bring back the scenes.
customer_reviews.author: Life Currents

customer_reviews.title: Can't connect to the bulb
customer_reviews.text: Tried all night trying to get to the bulb via wifi. Tried resetting the bulb, the router, and rebooting my phone. I lost track of the number of attempts. The setup is so bad. The colors look nice since you get a glimpse of it for 2 secs every time you reset the bulb.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: so good. My favorite setting is "lava lamp"
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. My favorite setting is "lava lamp". We shall have a ball showing the grand daughters (10, 7 and 4) how to use it. Me thinks they'll be lovin' the "strobe" effect and the different colors. Plan on ordering more now that this one is working so well, but we'll be using it 12 hours a day, so that 27 years @ 4hrs/day will be down to 9 years of life...looks like I need to put the receipt in a safe place.
customer_reviews.author: Roger P. Orcutt

customer_reviews.title: I bought one bulb to see how good it was
customer_reviews.text: I have been interested in the Hue system but was hesitant to purchase any products due to low lumens and when I heard of LIFX, and the fact that the light output was equal to a 75 watt incandescent, I bought one bulb to see how good it was. Well, it is as bright as a regular bulb and took about 2 minutes to set up and am very pleased with it. Yes, it runs a little hot. However, I remember popcorn poppers as a child that used a 100 watt incandescent, and the LIFX is definitely not that hot. As soon as I can save more money and my wife lets me, Im going to be buying many more.
customer_reviews.author: Tallen1

customer_reviews.title: Five stars plus!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this so that I could turn lights on and off when away from the house and it works perfect.
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal
customer_reviews.text: great product reasonable price and good delivery, fun to play with
customer_reviews.author: Charles T. Hause

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My family and I love this product. Extremely versatile lighting for every mood and occasion.
customer_reviews.author: vonpolis

customer_reviews.title: So if you want to integrate it with the internet of things I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: The bulb works but it it does not work with IFTTT. That was the main reason I bought it, and it do not work. Tech support respond my first emails, after that they got lost, no answer. So if you want to integrate it with the internet of things I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: gerardo Rocha

customer_reviews.title: It looks like a promising item but do not use if you ...
customer_reviews.text: It looks like a promising item but do not use if you are running Android 6.0. I have already spent too many hours of my life trying to get this to work but the lights just will not connect to my app. It's unfortunately more expensive but, choose Hue or another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Q Singleton

product_meta.title: LIFX Original A21 Wi-Fi Smart LED Light Bulb, Multicolor, Adjustable, Dimmable, No Hub Required, Pearl White, Works with Alexa
feature_bullets: Works with Amazon Alexa to support dimming, shades of white, and color settings through voice control (Alexa device sold separately)
